title: Motorola Edge 30 goes official in some regions with Snapdragon 778G Plus
content:
Motorola recently released the Motorola Edge Plus in the United States, confusingly dubbed the Motorola Edge 30 Pro in the rest of the world. “Pro” (or, I guess, “Plus”) would generally indicate the existence of a non-pro Edge deviceâ€¦ though that wasn’t the case. However, last week a set of real-life photos leaked that looked

The post Motorola Edge 30 goes official in some regions with Snapdragon 778G Plus appeared first on XDA.
description: The Motorola Edge 30 has gone official with a Snapdragon 778G Plus in tow, though its availability is a bit strange. Check it out here.
